"""Test get_rdf_port_remote_connections."""
remote_port_details = self.replication.get_rdf_port_remote_connections(
    director_id='RF-1D', port_id=4)
self.assertEqual(pcd.CommonData.remote_port_details, remote_port_details)
mock.patch.object(common.CommonFunctions, 'get_request', return_value=pcd.
    CommonData.remote_port_details)
